mema ghathana siddhiyata adalawa nawika hamudawe hitapu sampath munasinha, nawika hamudawe hitapu madhya prakashaka kamandar di.ke.pi. dasanayaka, nawika hamudawe hitapu buddhi niladhari ranasinha pedige sumith ranasinha, thilakarathnage lakshman udaya kumara, kariyawasam gama hewage nalin prasanna wikramasuriya, ihala gedara dhammika dharmadasa, rajapaksha pathiranage kithsiri, kasthurige gamini saha buddhi niladhari aruna thusharada mendis yana aya me wanawita apa matha nidahaswa siti.

mowun ්eychinba (uthuru amarikawe aadiwasin athara bhawithawu eki bhashawa pawichchi kala janawargaya* ීkdaha (bi්ratish kolombiya, albata aadi pedeswala wyaptha aadi wasi janakotas* ෘdatarasaila omaejayadabala orasabatasaela uthuru amarikawe pasipik kalapiya wayambaa diga thiruwe padinchi* aadi pa්radhana aadi wasi jana wargayangen samanwitha we.

thawada mema siddhiyedi premachandra manthriwarayage bellata atha thaba thallukota iwathata hari yana duminda silwa manthriwarayata premachandra manthriwarayage aarakshaka gamini wisin pitapita wedi dekakma thabimen pasu mema sulu siddhiya barapathala siddhiyak bawata pathwu bawa abhiyachana nadu wibhagayedi paminili parshwaya wu nithipathiwaraya wisin pawa piliganima anuwa duminda silwa waradakaruwaku kirimata ha ohuta danduwam niyama kirimata winisuruwariya gena athi thiranaya sahamulinma waradi thinduwak bawa oonama ayakuta watahena sarala siddhanthayak bawada janadhipathi nithignyawarun panchapudgala winishchaya mandalaya hamuwe penwa duni.
